course.title: The Science of Fiction
course.description: A course in narrative fiction film production, emphasizing experimental and conceptual forms, literary adaptation and artist-filmmakers. Students push the artistic boundaries of filmmaking, each student writes, directs and edits several exercises as well as creating a short film. We then throw out our scripts and work in improvisatory, associative modes. We look closely at structure, performance and genre--melodrama, sci-fi, western. Students learn techniques of camera, lighting, sound and editing. Student work is discussed extensively in class.
